meanings.sent1: Everyone was invited to the party excepted Tom.
meanings.sent2: All the cookies were eaten excepted the one on the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The magician made all the animals disappear excepted the bunny.
meanings.sent4: The garden was full of colorful flowers excepted one black rose.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to many hidden gems excepted the biggest diamond.

meanings.sent1: The team won all their games excepted the last one.
meanings.sent2: She tried all the ice cream flavors excepted the mint chocolate chip.
meanings.sent3: The detective solved all the cases excepted the mysterious one.
meanings.sent4: The chef prepared all the dishes excepted the special dessert.
meanings.sent5: The library had every book excepted the rare first edition.
